# Univariate summary CRASH-2 dataset 

```{r }
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(summarytools)
```

## Read data

### Load the dataset.

```{r}
load(here::here("data", "crash2.rda"))
crash2 %>% glimpse()
```

### Describe the dataset

#### Hmisc describe

```{r}
Hmisc::html(Hmisc::describe(crash2))
```

#### Summarytools


```{r, results='asis'}
st_options(style = "rmarkdown")

print(
  summarytools::dfSummary(crash2, valid.col = FALSE, graph.magnif = 0.75),
# max.tbl.height = 300,
  method = "render"
)

```
